content: I am a computer architecture research scientist and software/hardware engineer. I am a senior software engineer in the Network Infrastructure team at Google working on next generation hardware and software systems for Google networks.
summary: I am a computer architecture research scientist and software/hardware engineer. I am a senior software engineer in the Network Infrastructure team at Google working on next generation hardware and software systems for Google networks.
title: Nic McDonald
